post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new holiday. If a holiday with the same date already exists, the holiday will be updated with the provided details.

date.description: In case single date in YYYY-MM-DD

dates.description: In case array list date in [YYYY-MM-DD,YYYY-MM-DD]

get.description: This endpoint is used to get holiday details for month
This endpoint is used to delete holiday.

post.description: This endpoint is used to create a new holiday. If a holiday with the same date already exists, the holiday will be updated with the provided details.
This API is used to book a session with an astrologer based on availability. The booking request contains information such as the astrologer ID, booking time, duration, and other necessary details.
This endpoint is used to create a new holiday. If a holiday with the same date already exists, the holiday will be updated with the provided details.

get.description: Fetch the availability details for a specific astrologer for a given month and year. This API also return holday details
This API returns a list of available time slots for a given astrologer on a specified date, excluding any already booked slots. The duration of each slot is configurable.

post.description: This API allows users to search for astrologer bookings based on certain criteria.

email.description: this will be used in case filter (booked by)

mobileNo.description: this will be used in case filter (booked by)

consent.message: By proceeding with the booking you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. And you also agree for us to create an account for you with Eklavya Astrology if you are a first-time user and do not have an existing account with us.

get.description: This API retrieves detailed information about a specific booking using the bookingId.

post.description: This API is designed to send emails by utilizing a predefined email template identified by a templateId. The API allows for dynamic content to be injected into the email template using variables, and supports additional email features such as CC (Carbon Copy) and BCC (Blind Carbon Copy).

The Generate Client Token API is designed to generate a secure, one-time-use token for clients. This token can be used in scenarios such as password reset flows. The request and response are encrypted to ensure the security of sensitive information. 
Input and response will be in encrypted format.

details.content: Help students find the right education path. Area or subject in which you should pursue your education.
If you are confused about what education field Subject you should choose, which is best suitable for you as well as in which you can get maximum success. Then you should take this consultation.
Checking after marriage life condition - good or bad

Embarking on the journey of parenthood is a profound and transformative experience, but it can also come with its unique challenges. Our astrology consultancy service specializes in providing insights and guidance on childbirth-related matters, offering a personalized approach to help you navigate this significant phase of life.
Astrology can offer insights into potential challenges, timings, and astrological factors influencing fertility, pregnancy, and childbirth.
Its a Legal Guidance like when to file the law suit and what are the chances of you winning
when and what can be the out come.

Kundali matching, also known as Kundli Milan or Horoscope Matching, is a traditional Vedic astrology practice that assesses the compatibility between two individuals for the purpose of marriage. This process involves a thorough analysis of the birth charts or Kundalis of the prospective bride and groom. Key elements considered in Kundali matching include
Mangal Dosha
Nakshatra Compatibility etc.
Guna Milan (Ashtakoota Compatibility)

D20 or Vimshamsha is mainly seen for spiritual progress. 9th house and 9th lord is important in D20. Also need to check the dasha lord and see its placement in D20 to check for spiritual growth in the dasha period. The spiritual consultation addresses the spiritual aspect of any physical, emotional concern that is impacting someone’s daily life and is completely confidential. Spiritual fitness is about having a sense of purpose and meaning in your life

Find the best baby name for your child which is perfect based on astrology and your child’s Zodiac Sign. Astrology names are determined based on child’s date of birth, Vedic astrology takes into account the zodiac sign / sun sign /Nakshatra of your baby while determining a name that will bring good luck and fortune to the child and his/her family.

details.content: Prashna (Horary Astrology) : You can ask a single question which is a burning issue in your life currently and you desperately need that answer so in that case prashna comes to rescue. ( NO BIRTH CHART READING )

This report includes planetary transit report of your running month to next 12 month based on transit planets influence over your vedic natal chart & importance should be given to your each & Every houses score in Ashtakavarga chart & transit planet influence over that each & every houses where natal planets are placed. So these deep analysis will help you to get report of running 12 month good & bad events details with month wise reading.

post.description: This API is used to add new product variants or update existing variants for a specific product in the catalogue. Each variant can represent a different version of the same product, such as different sizes, colors, or other attributes. If a variantId is provided, the API updates the existing variant; otherwise, it adds a new variant to the product.
